channel.title: Seeking Testers and Development Team! 718 running a EoC Cache (not combat)
channel.description:
[size=3]I'm looking for testers as I'm coming close to releasing a beta of what i have remade from Ben's Project (all credit for source goes to Bandoswhips/Matrix Team) Much stuff looks the same but am in the process of making it my own, but it will never be 100% mine as we wouldn't have 718's without the matrix team and i wouldn't have a nice solid source if not for Bandoswhips of Rune-Sever![/size]
[img]http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/7937/bk3n.png[/img]
[size=3]Post here/PM me if you are interested. Some testers might get Staff spots (mod, admin, developer, etc...)[/size]
[SIZE=4]TEMP HOME FOR NOW(voting on my forums for new one)[/SIZE] [IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/3218/m3of.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Original Releases Home(old home where npcs are still located(:: oldhome))[/SIZE] [IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/7738/8gno.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]EoC Look of items and also Drygore Longsword![/SIZE] [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/6669/q7q8.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]More Photos coming soon as i started writing this without taking some first![/SIZE]
